title: Giovanna Fletcher opens up about heartbreaking miscarriage - "You feel like your body has failed you"

Giovanna Fletcher has revealed she suffered a heartbreaking miscarriage. 
Giovanna, 32, has sons Buzz, three and 12-month-old Buddy with her McFly star husband Tom Fletcher , 31, but miscarried before falling pregnant with Buzz. 
Speaking at BUILD Series London, she said: "When it comes to miscarriage I think we're all too scared to say something. I felt like I could never say anything to friends because people feel like it's contagious. 
"It's a really rubbish thing that happens and it happens to so many people. All you really want in that moment is a hug. Giovanna and her two children (Photo: Instagram / mrsgifletcher) Childhood sweethearts: Tom and Giovanna (Photo: Getty) 
"You feel like your body has failed you and that's your first experience as a mother. 
"I fell pregnant very quickly and I had this thing in my head that it was just too easy. After being worried for so long that it wouldn't be easy it just happened. 
"And then I miscarried not long after that and I think part of me felt that would happen, because I felt that it was too easy. Because I felt that I hadn't earned it. If that didn't happen I wouldn't have Buzz and Buzz will forever be my silver lining." (Photo: Instagram / mrsgifletcher)
